ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kedge
ygData.msgSnippet: Well since the fishes you kill in Kedge often drop scales, you can usually get all you need while you are inside the dungeon. Galtin of E ci ... From: Scott
ygData.messageBody:
Well since the fishes you kill in Kedge often drop scales, you can usually
get all you need while you are inside the dungeon.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Malin [mailto:Thanos0000@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:34 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge


From: "Windleaf Mistsong" <windleaf@...>
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge


> You should be able to buy fish scales. There's merchants that sell fish
> scales and batwings and other spell components. I sure wish I remembered
> where they were though.

Only 2 places I know of, there's a Female Euridite vendor in EC near the WC
zone about middle of the zone (north/south middle that is). And I think they
are also for sale in the Freeport casters guild. The EC vendor is on
Betaneutral faction it seems, she sells to my DE necro as well as my Woodelf
bard.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
